mapper.insert: insert into tbseqno (fsCls, fsShopGUID, fiSeqNo, fsUpdateTime, lver) values (#{fscls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fsshopguid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fiseqno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fsupdatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lver,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tbseqno
fsCls,
fsShopGUID,
fiSeqNo,
fsUpdateTime,
lver,
